metadata.name: crossroads 1/800
metadata.description: This mint is my crossroads. Either it saves me from going to the army or not. In my country, the army here is sectarian, dictatorial, killing civilians. Unfortunately, the time for compulsory military service is approaching, and I do not want to be a partner in killing civilians, so I need your help for me. Please, my brothers, help me, save me.  Me and my children I am a father separated from my wife and all my children I have their mother in another country If I go to the army no one will take care of my children Help me pay the exemption fees
